product_name: Club Ride Long Shot Bike Jersey - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: A moisture-wicking, quick-drying bike jersey, the women's Long Shot from Club Ride has a hidden front zipper vent and underarm vents so you arrive cool and fresh. Polyester fabric offers UPF 30 sun protection. Stretches for comfort, wicks moisture and dries quickly. Hidden front zipper can open for airflow while the front stays snapped; side and underam mesh panels increase the airflow. 2 zippered rear pockets, 1 with media port. The semifitted Long Shot Bike Jersey from Club Ride features a not-too-tight, not-too-loose fit. Closeout.
short_description: A moisture-wicking, quick-drying bike jersey, the women's Long Shot from Club Ride has a hidden front zipper vent and underarm vents so you arrive cool and fresh.
